meanings.definition: A brand of motorcycles manufactured in India by Ideal Jawa Ltd, based in Mysore, from 1960 to 1996. The brand was revived in 2022 by Classic Legends, a subsidiary of Mahindra & Mahindra.
meanings.english_definition: A brand of motorcycles manufactured in India.

examples.sentence: My father used to ride a Yezdi motorcycle in his youth.
examples.translation: 私の父は若い頃、Yezdiのバイクに乗っていました。

etymology.value: Named after Yezdiar Setna, one of the founders of Ideal Jawa Ltd.
